mapper.select: select ap.channel_id, ap.app_id, ap.app_name, DATE_FORMAT(av.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, av.* from t_app_version av left join t_app ap on ap.app_id=av.app_id where 1=1 and av.`status`=true and av.version_id=#{versionId}

select ap.app_id, ap.app_name, DATE_FORMAT(av.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(av.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, av.* from t_app_version av left join t_app ap on ap.app_id=av.app_id where av.`status`=true
and ap.channel_id=#{channelId}
and (av.version_code like CONCAT('%',#{version},'%') or av.version_name like CONCAT('%',#{version},'%'))
and av.version_type=#{versionType}
and (ap.app_id like CONCAT('%',#{app},'%') or ap.app_name like CONCAT('%',#{app},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(av.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(av.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and av.instruction like CONCAT('%',#{instruction},'%')
and av.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by ap.app_name,av.version_code desc
